name: Aliens Vs Cows
description:
ENTER THE CODE TO SAVE THE COW

This game is played via a PowerPoint file that holds the clues to save the cow from the aliens! 

(The PowerPoint slides were actually made in Google Slides so we're hoping they translate ok to other applications!)

This game was made for the PowerPoint Game Jam as part of the Tinderbox Lab Virtual Studio, a group of digital artists that meet virtually on Wednesday nights to explore electronics & digital art, and have recently been doing more game design together.

With thanks to Doska, Sunny, Sonia, Liam and Luci for making Aliens Vs Cows!

Find out more about Tinderbox here: https://tinderboxcollective.org/
